name: Mehr Baby
greetingText: By any chance if you forgot , your BF is an engineer, here's your surprise <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Mehr😘!! Wish you many many happy returns of the day..blah blah
text2: That's what I was about to do.
text4: I should make something from my own, that you might
outroText: Dear Mehr, A very very Happy Birthday to You, I know this anniversary isn't like our previous anniversaries but still let's make it count, we're officially 3 years together... although things didn't well between us...but mehr aaj bhi utna hi pyaar hai tumse...or tumhari jagah koi bhi replace nhi kr rha... actually koi merko utna smjha hi nhi jitna tumne smjha hai.... Thankyou for giving me my Wonderful 3 Years of my Life ❤️... This is just a small message to tell you.... that no matter what happens between us.... you will be my favourite anyday... and listenn I Love You so much you don't know this... but I do ❤️😘 ...A very Happy Birthday baby 🎁🎉
wishText: To the most gorgeous and loving girl I could ever wish for , A very Happy Birthday to you, Trust me you look killing beautiful babyyy..I love youuuuu😘
replayText: And this is my own coded website just to for you,I hope you liked it and keep this forever with you, With all love~ Your Sujal❤️
